artist: Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Fabric variations using "Orange Malachite" warp of orange and yellow-orange threads. Orange & gold warp. Woven in sections of Green & yellow, orange & green, yellow & tan, yellow, green, tan and black. Plain weave variation. Left selvedge. (orange, gold, yellow, tan, green, black)

title: Orange Malachite Warp Development and Sampling
